text: American Gladiators may refer to: *American Gladiators (1989 TV series), an American competition television program that aired from 1989 to 1996 *American Gladiators (2008 TV series), an American competition television program that aired in 2008 *American Gladiators (video game), a video game made in 1991 by Incredible Technolo ==See also== * Gladiators (franchise), franchise for the 1989, 2008, and video game * Gladiators 2000, children's edition of the 1989 show * * * American (disambiguation) * Gladiator (disambiguation)
title: American Gladiators
